metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Missoula. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Susan Colyer, CFP速|ChFC速|AAMS速

heroDescription: Missoula, Montana, is a vibrant city known for its outdoor recreation and cultural scene.
landscapeDescription: Missoula's economy is driven by education, healthcare, and tourism. The city is home to the University of Montana, which significantly influences local employment.
uniqueNeeds: Missoula's economy relies heavily on education and tourism, necessitating diversification and sustainable growth strategies.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Missoula's reliance on education and tourism poses risks; consider diversifying investments. Real estate may face volatility due to seasonal demand and natural disaster risks like wildfires.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Missoula's economy has shown steady growth, primarily driven by the education and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Missoula is $56,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Missoula are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and sustainable investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Missoula's cost of living is moderate, with housing costs rising due to demand from new residents.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Missoula's real estate market is competitive, with home values increasing steadily, raising concerns about affordability.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Missoula's business climate is supportive, with incentives for startups and a focus on sustainable practices.
